make -f bacapp.mak clean make -f bacapp.mak ./bacapp >> test.log make -f bacapp.mak clean

clean

make -f demo/object/bv.mak clean make -f demo/object/bv.mak ./binary_value >> test.log make -f demo/object/bv.mak clean
